summary: Gleda is a new invulnerable animal follower. Not at all helpful in combat! Just friendly and sweet!
descriptionHtml:
GLEDA THE GOATBORN. Gleda is a follower with all the base follower commands except she is a remarkably unexceptional goat! Based off a hilarious web comic you can view here. http://www.deviantart.com/art/Skyrim-Gleda-the-Goatborn-312635852

Gleda can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. Speak to her and she will automatically become your follower. She should return there if you dismiss her as well.
author: Common Cipher
